Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hi.
Hey, you remembered my birthday... Thanks, !
Oh, it's, uh... *sniff*... what is it?
Hey, you remembered my birthday... Thanks, ! This is really nice!
Whoa... Where'd you find this? The workmanship is fascinating...
It's a little too rusty to use, but I'll add it to my collection.
This makes you wonder... Thousands of years ago, there was probably a little purple-haired cavewoman who played this flute, just like me.
...I'll have to wash it before pressing it to my lips, though.
Oh, wow... ! Are you sure you want to give this to me? It's so rare!
I'll admit, my mouth is watering already...
0.5Thank you! This is my favorite stone. It's so pretty.
Whoa, that's a creepy looking book... I love it!
*Flip* *flip* *flip*... Ooh... It's full of monsters...
I'll have to study this before going into the caves... Thanks!
Hey, this is my favorite magazine! My Dad won't let me have a subscription, so I have to get it on the black market like this...
Wow... the color is so beautiful, like an amethyst. Thanks!
Disgusting... I love it!
Oh... I... I understand. You see me as just a friend...
I guess we weren't really a good match...
Don't tell anyone, but I snuck into the old community center last night... I think it's haunted!
is blushing, but she looks happy.
...You're cute.
Uh... ? We've been dating for almost a year. Is this going anywhere?
Hey, I heard you and Sam got together... He's a really good guy!
We've been friends for a long time. You'd better be good to him, or you'll see my bad side!
I heard you and Sebastian started dating... I didn't realize you guys had a thing...
What are you doing here? Just leave me alone!
Don't talk to me!
...okay.
I guess when you have something to lose, it's normal to be afraid...
...Um, okay. Sorry.
... I'm alright.
See? You understand why I'm out here, then.
I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!
Sure. I don't want to kill anything, either. I just want to do a little exploring without risking my neck!
Oh, it's because I'm a girl... isn't it? Ugh...
Why? I'm just as strong as you!
I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself!
Really? That's surprising.
I see...
Yea... I guess you would be one to appreciate this somber ambience.
...That's true.
Yeah... I guess my own life is okay...
I would feel better if I could believe that...
But I don't.
Oh? *sigh*... I guess I'll never get past this level, then...
Great! I'm sure you'll be able to beat this level with ease.
Hey, I finally beat the first level of Journey Of The Prairie King! Watching you play helped a lot.
Sebastian mentioned that he heard strange music while having dinner the other night...
I didn't tell him it was us! It seemed better to keep it a mystery.
The spirits have a mind of their own...
Sam and Sebastian asked me to play drums in their band... I've never played drums before, but it's actually pretty fun.
You have to learn how to move your limbs to different rhythms, at the same exact time. I feel like my brain is growing.
Ah... Fall's here!
I was getting so tired of summer.

Will I see you tomorrow at the Spirit's Eve 
            
            
            
            ? Look for me in the haunted maze.
I usually feel lonely this time of year, but not anymore.
, what are your plans for the future?
I wish the season lasted a little longer.
When the wind really picks up, I almost feel like a kid again.
I need to stretch my legs and get some fresh air today.
You know, I could actually see myself becoming a farmer some day...
But how would that ever happen? *chuckle*
cc#I can't believe you fixed up that old Community Center all by yourself. I'm really impressed.|Do you have any scarecrows on your farm?
Hi.
Your hair looks cool today... did you do something different?
Hmm... what should I do tonight?I was thinking about dyeing my hair again... what do you think?Dye it black.Why not blonde?How about bubblegum pink?I like your hair just the way it is!
27#I was going to dye my hair but then I decided against it.|Yes? What is it?
Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic . Does that mean anything?
doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.
I had an interesting dream last night, with you in it.
It was a good dream.
joja#I try to help out in the shop on most days. Business has been pretty bad since the Joja Mart opened, though.|Ever since Joja Mart shut down we've been doing great at the shop!
I may fight with my parents a lot, but I know they're just looking out for me. They're doing what they think is best.
I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.
I can't wait to see some pumpkins this year.
The spirit's eve festival happens at the end of the season. It's pretty low-key compared to what you'd see in Zuzu City, but for a small town like this it's a lot of fun.
Are you growing pumpkins on your farm this year?
Save one for me!
Hey, sure. Let's do it. We can be embarrassed together.
B... But... I wanted to dance with...
Just kidding! Of course I'm dancing with you. I love you.
That's flattering... but I'm gonna have to say no. Sorry.
Wow, I just realized it's Friday.
Sometimes I totally lose track of time.
We're all going to hang out in the saloon this evening. It's kind of like a Friday tradition, I guess.
The birds were happily chirping today. They're too simple to understand the future.
It's better to be like them, isn't it?
I want to go exploring, but I can tell my Mom is kind of worried. I don't want to add to her stress.
Have you seen all the crazy trees around town? Everything looks so different... I feel like we're in a fairy world.
And just like that, everything's back to normal. It's like magic!
Oh, that's right... I heard someone new was moving onto that old farm.
It's kind of a shame, really. I always enjoyed exploring those overgrown fields by myself.
Haha... I can't believe Sam is a married man, now. Who would've thought?
Joking aside, I think he'll make a great father some day.
Congratulations on the marriage. I guess this means Sebastian won't be moving to the city like he always talked about.
That'll be nice. I'd be kind of sad if I never saw him again. We've always been good friends.
I heard you've been exploring the old mines. That sounds like fun!
...I'm working up the courage to go there myself...
Oh, hey. Taking a break from work?
Oh, hi!
Do you ever hang out at the cemetery? It's a peaceful place to spend some time alone.
I remember when you first arrived in town, I was a little sad that those old woods would be turned into farmland. But now I'm really glad you moved here!|...Oh, ! Hi.
Want to hang out for a while? Here! Let me read your palm. *giggle*
Did you hear about the new movie theater in town? I'm excited to check it out!
Bummer... Willy says we have to stay on the beach...
And I brought my sword and everything...
Gus made me a dark purple refresher, to match my hair. It tastes great!
I hope a mermaid visits the beach.
I'm gonna ask Willy if we can take the scenic route back.
Maybe we'll see a sea monster on the way back.
The beach is okay, but it gets boring pretty quick. I'd rather check out that dark jungle, or the volcano!
Hmm, you think I could sneak my guinea pig onto the island?
Nah, David's probably not much of a swimmer anyways.
My skin gets burnt really easily. So I'm just gonna stay under this umbrella for a while.
I like it in the shade. Too much sun makes me dizzy.
Hey , want to build a sand castle with me?
Actually, a sand dungeon might be cooler!
Hey , you think you could build a raft?
I saw a few cool islands on the way here I want to visit.
An island this big has got to be hiding some buried treasure.
Quick, get me a shovel!
Relax, I'm just kidding.
The fresh mountain air is nice on a day like this.
I wonder if the frogs will make an appearance soon.
You came all this way to visit me? That's nice.
So have you been exploring the mountain caves at all?
Interesting. I'd like to go there myself one of these days.
*sigh*... I can't stay mad at you anymore, . Let's just move on with our lives.
I'm definitely going to enter the egg hunt tomorrow. Are you?
Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. Dancing is alright, but they make me wear this stupid white dress...
Summer's here. It's not really my favorite season.
The air is so muggy I feel like I'm floating in soup.
Everyone's excited for the Luau tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.
You can't miss tomorrow's festival. It's one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley.
I went to the beach last night, after dark... Sometimes you can see strange lights bobbing over the sea.
Or maybe that was just a dream I had... It doesn't feel real anymore.
I kind of wish I had a cat. Unfortunately, my Dad is allergic to pretty much everything.
Do you ever get lonely on your farm?
My pet guinea pig, David, just hates this hot weather. He's fussy.
I used to think Pelican Town was kinda drab, but lately I'm starting to love some things about it.
I'm looking forward to fall... the cool mountain breeze, the swirling red petals, the smell of mushrooms... *sigh*
I'm actually enjoying myself this summer.
It's funny how quickly one's outlook can change.
Do you ever get an urge to go exploring, ?Okay... pretend you just won a free vacation. Where would you go?The beachIn a dark caveThe old, gnarled forestJoja Mega-Mall
25#I do... but you probably wouldn't like the places I'm thinking about...|Maybe we'll be neighbors someday. I think we both have similar, weird tastes.
If I knew how to use a sword I would be exploring those caves by the mountain lake right now. It's probably nice and cool in there.
Wow, you look nice today.
I mean, that summer air is really good for the complexion, isn't it?... heh...
Ew, I hope I don't get a tan this summer.
The air is so thick with honey and nectar all summer. I almost feel dizzy.
You're an interesting ${guy
lady}$, . I'm glad you moved here.
Have you decorated your house at all? That's what I'd be doing if I had a house.
I would love to live in an old farmhouse like you.
The creak of a floorboard, the slow plumes of dust whispering through the rafters... There's something special about an old building, isn't there?
Oh man... I've been pushing off my homework all weekend. Looks like I'll be pulling another all-nighter...
Hmm, interesting...
Well that's an interesting theory!
Huh. I think that would get old fast.
Yea! That sounds wonderful.
I guess that's a pretty safe choice, huh?
I'll think about it.
Of course that's what you'd say.
Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.
I'm glad. It's embarrassing to share your art with others. But I think you and I are on the same page.
Rude! Why would you hurt my feelings like that? You're so insensitive!
You know, that wouldn't be so bad.
17#I guess you think nothing would happen, right?|Maybe a wicked ghost would appear!
You're always good for a laugh.

I wonder what would happen if I spent all night in the graveyard?, what do you think happens to us after we die?I have no idea.We come back as spooky ghosts.We go to Heaven.Our energy bodies enter the astral plane.Nothing. We just cease to exist.
Oh no, I think my Dad's going to cook dinner tonight...
I don't feel like doing anything today...
Do you feel like everything seems unreal lately?
Not in a bad way, though.
Ugh... I'm not in a good mood right now.
I said I'm not in a good mood... what do you want?
I know my parents mean well, but sometimes they just cannot understand my point of view. Weren't they ever young?
Hi, I'm glad to see you.
I want to take my mind off things for a while... how is your day going?
Hey. Sorry in advance if I say anything rude. I didn't get much sleep last night.
What do you want?
Oh, hi . Taking a break from your work?
Me too. Oh! Nothing physical... just some online classes I'm taking.
I can't trust a person who doesn't like animals...
Oh, don't worry! I know you're an animal lover!
Well, fall is over...
But I like winter, too!
I'm going to eat so much cranberry sauce tomorrow.
I'm looking forward to making a snow man tomorrow.
One thing I've learned living here... everyone stares at you if you look different.
, there's something I want to tell you...
It's just... um... well... your boots! They, uh...look really clean... *gulp*
That's all... *sigh*
It's just too cold to go outside much.
But I do enjoy building a snowgoon.
It's the weekend!
That means I can play twice as many video games.
Bye.
I've been daydreaming a lot lately...
Oh! You want to know what it's about? Well...
...It's a secret.
Oh, hello.I made these two drawings. What do you think?I like the jungle island and the tiger.I like the orc with the battleaxe.I don't like either of them.
29#Remember those drawings I showed you a while ago? I accidentally threw them away.|Remember that drawing I showed you with the orc? I entered it into an online contest and won 50g!
Another year is almost over.
It goes by so fast, doesn't it?
Another year is almost over...
But this was a really good year, don't you think?
Doesn't a steaming hot cup of cocoa sound good right now?
It's so cold, I wish we had a hot cup of cocoa to share.
Hi. Is it boring to be a farmer during the winter?
Hi. If you're ever bored, you can always hang out in my room.
As long as I'm not changing, of course!
It must be nice not having crops to worry about this time of year.
And that means you can hang out with me more often!
Feeling pretty good about the egg hunt, huh? Well, next year you won't be so lucky...
I'm still mad that you beat me at the egg hunt last year. You'd better start practicing...
Hehe. Me? Married? I never thought this would happen.
We're going to have a lot of fun together.
I'm engaged to a farmer. Wow!
Our lives are going to be a lot different from now on.
*gasp*...!
... are you okay?
It looks like you're just scraped up a little... you had me worried!
I... I've never taken a life before...
Look... You've gotta be more careful from now on. I don't want to lose you.
Let's put him to rest nearby... okay?
Yeah... I did what I had to do.
I guess the world's a pretty tough place. It was either you or him, right?
Huh? That's pretty funny coming from someone who just got rescued...
But... yeah... Sometimes reality forces us to do things we'd rather not... Guess I'm learning that the hard way.
Hey! I saved your life, didn't I? Maybe you should think about that instead of putting me on a guilt trip.
Good thing I brought my sword today!
Hi. Um... I just wanted to say sorry for acting so weird yesterday.
You probably understand what happened...
Uh, okay...bye.
Nope.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019
Entries.DialogueText: Never thought you'd find all your 'girlfriends' in one room, huh ?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019_1
Entries.DialogueText: Well? What do you have to say for yourself?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019_2
Entries.DialogueText: Nice try, but that's not going to cut it...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Hold it!

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/k 195019_implied
Entries.DialogueText: Ladies, calm down! I can explain...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195019/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/i 446/k 195012
Entries.DialogueText: We were just gossiping about Mayor Lewis and Marnie...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:HaleyHouse/195019/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny 2500/f Abigail 2500/f Leah 2500/f Maru 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 38/e 2123343/e 10/e 901756/e 54/e 15/i 446/k 195012_alt
Entries.DialogueText: Hey there!
You can't weasel your way out of this one, .
Cool
Me next!
776589 null 776589 20 Event_Cave2_1 776589 40 Event_Cave2_2#Are you okay?
You know I've been practicing my swordsmanship for a while...
Well I decided today would be the day I venture into the caves...
...but I got scared. I couldn't do it.
34 null 34 20 Event_Cave_1 34 40 Event_Cave_2 34 -50 Event_Cave_3#You're crying like a little baby. Stop.
, I... I really like you... And not just as a friend. You know that, right?
I can't believe I'm actually saying this... But I can't keep it in anymore. I've felt this way for a long time.
You don't have to say anything right now. Let's just stay here for a while...
I didn't know I felt this way about other girls... until I met you.
32 null 32 0 Event_Rain_1 32 50 Event_Rain_2 32 10 Event_Rain_3#I could ask you the same question
...I came here to spend some time alone.
But I don't mind your company!
You're getting soaked... come stand under the tree.
It's impossible to describe this feeling... watching the curtains of rain whisper above a silent lake.
Hey! A mini-harp!
You're full of surprises, . I'm impressed.
You scared me, sneaking into my room like that!
*sigh*... so I've been playing 'Journey of the Prairie King' for hours and I can't even beat the first level...
This game is ridiculously hard!
Well, either that or I'm just terrible at it.
Hey, do you want to try this level together with me? I think I might do better with your help.
Ugh, I give up... I'll never get past the first level.
Oh well... thanks for trying.
Stop telling me how to live my life!
Stop trying to make me feel guilty.
I appreciate that you and Dad are helping me out, but expecting me to dress the way you want is ridiculous.
I'm not a little girl anymore, Mom.
Is someone there?
I swear, this house is haunted.
Urgghh...
Sorry... I was fighting with my Mom earlier.
Hey! I was hoping you'd show up. I wanna show you something.
See this? It's called a spirit board. Have you ever used one?
Put your hands on the planchette with me...
Now the spirits will guide us toward a...
LOOK, it's moving!
The first letter is... 'I' ...
Next is... '' ...
Wow, look at it go! It's spelling out... ''...
Oops, accidentally knocked over the board! Heh heh...
It's just a silly game, it doesn't mean anything.
I, um, have something to do. You'll have to go... Sorry.
Hey, that was fun!
Well thanks, . You seem to really know your way around a joystick, huh? I guess that makes sense.
Thanks, . I didn't think you'd know how to work a joystick so well! But it seems you're experienced.
I guess you're wondering why I'm in the graveyard at this hour...
Well, I'm here because it's the best place in town to find some privacy.
Well, are you coming or not?
*sigh*... Can you believe my parents were ever young? They don't understand my perspective at all.
I know, I know... they grew up in a different era, with different values. It still ticks me off sometimes, okay?
Well, thanks for hearing me out .
Um, now could you help untangle my hair from this bush?
And I'm all sweaty because I've been practicing my swordsmanship.
Hey! What... you think I'm too weak to swing a blade?
Sorry, I guess I'm getting a little defensive.
You see, I want to explore the mountain caves... But I know it's too dangerous to go there unarmed.
847951 null 847951 10 Event_Grave1 847951 10 Event_Grave2 847951 -100 Event_Grave3 847951 0 Event_Grave4#No
Dad?
Mind your own business! You think I should be at home cooking dinner because I'm a girl, don't you?!
You're really stuck in the past, Dad...
Let's get out of here, .
Hey, don't even think about it! That's private!
Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.
Unfortunately it tasted like {3}.
It was still pretty good, though.
Standing here, looking out on the horizon... I get a feeling of endless possibility.
I'm just happy I get to explore this world, with you by my side...
I beat all these games last year!
I already beat all the games... now what?
Aren't these weapons cool? I might have to bring one of these home with us today.
This blade is so elegant. Maybe some day I'll have enough money to buy one!
You'll have to tell me what's beyond, I can't go on... spiders...
I can't go on... spiders...
Have you ever fought any of these monsters before?Even... the s-spiders?
Did you see the decorations on our house? I don't like it...
Go away, we're adversaries until the egg hunt is over!
Searching for eggs is like going on a treasure hunt.
'Do you think I'm too old to do the egg hunt?_Yes_Hmmph... you sound like my Mom!_No_Yeah, I guess so. If I'm still having fun, why stop?'
I really hate dancing in front of everyone... It's so embarrassing.Mom makes me do it.
We don't have to dance if you don't want to!
They should make the seniors dance this year. I bet they'd love it!
Don't let me stop you from having fun today. I just feel like watching the sea by myself.
It's tiring to socialize with everyone... I'd rather watch the sea.
After the soup tasting, let's go hang out on the docks away from everyone.
My dad's obsessed with the governor's visit. Everything has to be perfect!I think he's hoping to be mayor some day...
Such a rare and exciting thing...
I brought a blanket for us in case we get cold later.It's a little small, but I'm sure we can make it work...
Apparently there's a rare green jelly. I want to be the first to see it tonight!
I wonder if I could lick one of those canes...
Nothing like a piping hot feast on a cold winter's day, huh?
Brr... It's cold! I wanna get back under the covers...
I wonder which present is mine...I hope it's the big box!
Hey, honey... look, it's you!
What do you think of my snow-goon?
Imagine if we lived in an igloo together!It would be fun, but I'm happy living anywhere with you.
Have you ever thrown a bunch of pebbles on a frozen lake? It makes a very nice sound....Don't tell my dad, but I'm wearing the Winter Star sweater under this coat.
I seriously love this! You're the best, !
Hey, how'd you know I was hungry? This looks delicious!
What am I supposed to do with this?
What were you thinking? This is awful!
You brought me a present? Thanks.
